Text: Would be nice if it was just the show uploaded without all the other stuff that isn't needed... If it were just the show it would be a much faster download... right now it's been downloading already for close to 6 hours... thanks for the video part of the upload but idk about the rest, not really needed

That is your opinion and very much in The Minority.
You don't have to download everything, just choose the files you want to download.
